abstract: Meg Whitman may be angling for an opposite play to I.B.M.'s -- selling hardware with so many software extras that it comes with a premium price.
snippet: Meg Whitman may be angling for an opposite play to I.B.M.'s -- selling hardware with so many software extras that it comes with a premium price.

headline.main: A Clue on H.P.'s Plan to Best I.B.M.
